dct_title_s: Plan nouveau de l'ancienne Jerusalem selon l'auteur
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, vegetation, roads, places of historical interest.
Appears in Calmet's Dictionnaire historique ... geographique et litteral de la Bible. Paris, Emery, Saugrain, Pierre Martin, 1730, T. II.
